text: Shadow of the Past is a 1950 British crime film directed by Mario Zampi and starring Joyce Howard, Terence Morgan and Michael Medwin. The screenplay involves a man who catches sight of a woman believed by everyone to be dead. ==Cast== * Joyce Howard - Lady in Black * Terence Morgan - John Harding * Michael Medwin - Dick Stevens * Andrew Osborn - George Bentley * Wylie Watson - Caretaker * Marie Ney - Mrs. Bentley * Ella Retford - Daily Help * Ronald Adam - Solicitor * Louise Gainsborough - Susie * Ian Fleming - Doctor ==Critical reception== TV Guide gave the film two out of four stars and described it as a "modest murder mystery...Tightly paced with several highly tense sequences." ==References== ==External links== * Category:1950 films Category:British films Category:1950 crime films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Mario Zampi Category:British crime films
